original_text:
if you are snared in the words of your mouth,
    caught in the words of your mouth,
korean_text: 네 입의 말로 네가 얽혔으며 네 입의 말로 인하여 잡히게 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: if you are snared in the words of your mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 입의 말로 올무에 걸리면

sentences.original_text: caught in the words of your mouth,
